Name: Sports Team Season Record
Description: A CVT which gives the number of wins, losses and ties (draws) which a particular team achieved in a particular season.

Properties.Name: Losses
Properties.Description: Number of regular-season games this team lost. (Do not include games from the post-season, playoffs, or championship.)

Properties.Name: Season
Properties.Description: The season this record is for.

Properties.Name: Ties
Properties.Description: Number of regular-season games this team played that ended in a tie. (Do not include games from the post-season, playoffs, or championship.)

Properties.Name: Wins
Properties.Description: Number of regular-season games this team won. (Do not include games from the post-season, playoffs, or championship.)

Properties.Name: Team
Properties.Description: The team this record is for.
